columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The date and time that the line was written to the database.

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the event

columns.name: AccountObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: User principal name (UPN) of the account

columns.name: OnPremSid
columns.description: On-premises security identifier (SID) of the account

columns.name: AccountDisplayName
columns.description: Display name of the account user

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: User name of the account

columns.name: AccountDomain
columns.description: Domain of the account

columns.name: CriticalityLevel
columns.description: The criticality score of the account

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Type of identity; possible values: User, ServiceAccount

columns.name: DistinguishedName
columns.description: The user's distinguished name

columns.name: CloudSid
columns.description: Cloud security identifier of the account

columns.name: GivenName
columns.description: Given name or first name of the account user

columns.name: Surname
columns.description: Surname/family name of the account user

columns.name: Department
columns.description: Department that the account user belongs to

columns.name: JobTitle
columns.description: Job title of the account user

columns.name: EmailAddress
columns.description: SMTP address of the account

columns.name: SipProxyAddress
columns.description: SIP address of the account

columns.name: Address
columns.description: Address of the account user

columns.name: City
columns.description: City where the account user is located

columns.name: Country
columns.description: Country/Region where the account user is located

columns.name: IsAccountEnabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the account is enabled

columns.name: Manager
columns.description: The listed manager of the account user

columns.name: Phone
columns.description: The listed phone number of the account user

columns.name: CreatedDateTime
columns.description: Date and time when the account user was created

columns.name: ChangeSource
columns.description: Identifies which provider or process triggered the addition of the new row

columns.name: BlastRadius
columns.description: Based on org position and Entra roles/permissions (Low, Medium, High)

columns.name: CompanyName
columns.description: Name of the company for which the user works

columns.name: DeletedDateTime
columns.description: Date and time when the user account was deleted

columns.name: EmployeeId
columns.description: Employee identifier assigned by the organization

columns.name: OtherMailAddresses
columns.description: Additional email addresses of the user account

columns.name: RiskLevel
columns.description: Entra ID risk level of the user account

columns.name: RiskLevelDetails
columns.description: Details regarding the Entra ID risk level

columns.name: State
columns.description: State where the sign-in occurred, if available

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Tags assigned to the account user by Defender for Identity

columns.name: AssignedRoles
columns.description: (Entra-only) roles assigned to the account user

columns.name: PrivilegedEntraPimRoles
columns.description: Snapshot of privileged role schedules in Entra PIM

columns.name: TenantId
columns.description: Unique identifier for your organization's Entra tenant

columns.name: SourceSystem
columns.description: The source system for the record

columns.name: OnPremObjectId
columns.description: Active Directory object ID of the user

columns.name: TenantMembershipType
columns.description: User type in Entra; Guest, Member

columns.name: RiskStatus
columns.description: Status of the user's risk

columns.name: UserAccountControl
columns.description: Security attributes of the user account in the AD domain

columns.name: IdentityEnvironment
columns.description: Environment where the identity is used; CloudOnly, Hybrid, On-premises

columns.name: SourceProviders
columns.description: Source providers of the accounts for the identity; ActiveDirectory, EntraID, Okta

columns.name: GroupMembership
columns.description: Entra groups where the user account is a member
